title: Child Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a young person with a medium-light skin tone. It's often used to depict children, youth, or family members.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this child emoji with a medium-light skin tone is rendered with a cheerful, open expression and soft, rounded features. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading gives the child a playful, almost tangible presence, with subtle highlights that convey a sense of youthful innocence and joy. This emoji is perfect for conveying family, childhood memories, or simply a feeling of lighthearted fun in your digital conversations.
